availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Susan A. Durham Coakley (Green County, Kentucky, resident. )

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Samuel M. Durham and Margaret Durham. Married to John Coakley in Green County, Kentucky, on October 28, 1852. Resident of Taylor County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Taylor County in 1850. Resident of Green County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Green County in 1860. Owned Mary [Unknown] in Green County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
